thread.title: Oh No! Sad News For Quantico Fans As The Show Might Go Off Air
thread.title_full: Oh No! Sad News For Quantico Fans As The Show Might Go Off Air

title: Oh No! Sad News For Quantico Fans As The Show Might Go Off Air
text:
facebook 514 SHARES 
We know that Priyanka Chopra has been killing it with her acting chops in the series, Quantico . Currently, the show is running it's second season. Although the first season did fantastic on viewership, the second season is struggling with TRPs, from what we hear. The Cancel Bear, which is a TV ratings tracking system, has classified Quantico into the 'likey to be cancelled' category. Which means that the show might soon go off air. This comes as a sad news for all Quantico fans. 
The show has a rating of 0.76, which is considerably low. It was moved to the Monday slots in hopes to get better viewership, but that didn't change much. Hence the show is on the verge of getting canceled, as per the Cancel Bear. 
The office quotes, " Quantico probably won't move much higher than its current ratings, this season. It is what it is at this point, and that's a show ABC should cut ties with at season's end." 
This is so sad!
